properties.description: A warm, friendly space to make new friends and have a good old chat. When: Every Friday, 12noon - 2.00pm (11:50am - 12:30pm for optional gentle exercise class) Where: The Gallery, Kendal Leisure Centre. Includes: Tea, coffee, biscuits, light lunch & games. £2pp payable by card.
properties.title: Chatter Matters

properties.address: Kendal Library, Kendal, Westmorland and Furness LA9 4PY
properties.description: Public Library in the heart of Kendal Various activities for all ages. Free wi-fi. Public PCs to all members, easy to join. Books and online resources available to members. Hot drinks vending machine.
properties.title: Kendal Library

properties.description: Coffee, cake and a warm welcome - no charge/donations
properties.title: Kendal Parish Church

properties.description: We provide a warm, comfortable space with a warm drink and biscuits - Free of Charge. Open Monday – Friday 10.00 am - 1.30 pm until End of March 2024
properties.title: South Lakes Foyer - Warm Space

properties.description: Open to all drop-in session with hot drinks and snacks, optional hot lunch every Wednesday afternoon from 12.30pm-4pm.
properties.title: Warm Welcome Wednesdays

properties.address: Yealand Village Hall, Footeran Ln, Carnforth LA5 9SU
properties.description: Yealand Village Hall has a drop in café Coffee Stop on a Monday 10.30 - 11.30 Everyone welcome.
properties.title: Yealand Village Hall

properties.address: St John’s Church, Yealand Conyers, Carnforth LA5 9SL
properties.description: St John’s church is open seven days a week. A Friday coffee morning from 10:30am till 12pm offers hot drinks. Hot drinks are also offered on Sundays and Wednesdays after the service. You do not need to attend the services to join us for coffee. The church is warm and everyone is welcome.

hours._text: St John’s church is open seven days a week. A Friday coffee morning from 10:30am till 12pm offers hot drinks. Hot drinks are also offered on Sundays and Wednesdays after the service. You do not need to attend the services to join us for coffee. The church is warm and everyone is welcome.

properties.title: St John’s Church
